content:
Five friends A, B, C, D and E are sitting on a bench.
  1. C is sitting next to D.
  2. E is on the left end of the bench.
  3. A is sitting next to B.
  4. D is not sitting with E.
  5. A is on the right side of B and to the right side of E.
  6. C is on second position from right.
  7. A and C are sitting together.
question:

  5. A is on the right side of B and to the right side of E.
  6. C is on second position from right.
  7. A and C are sitting together.
What is the position of D?
